overview:
Marc-Antoine Benglia is co-founder, President and Chief Executive Officer of Axentra Corporation. Before joining Axentra’s Executive team in the spring of 2003, Marc-Antoine served as Chairman and President of Hemera Technologies Inc., a leading digital image content provider and digital image management tools developer he co-founded in 1997. During his tenure at Hemera, Marc-Antoine established one of the largest collections of digital images in the world, amassing more than 1.5 million digital image files sold through web, catalog and retail channels worldwide.

Prior to co-founding Hemera, Marc-Antoine occupied a managerial position in the European Public Relations Department of Corel Corporation and served as Director of Sales and Marketing at G&A Imaging Ltd., a developer of business-to-business software.

Marc-Antoine actively participates on the boards of several Canadian high technology companies and not-for-profit organizations.
